messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog

LGTM

Check it against feedvalidator.org before you start pointing people at it.

On 16 March 2013 02:36, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Check it against feedvalidator.org before you start pointing people at it.
>

Yep, all good.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=365969b31a81&repo=blog ***

go.blog: add Atom feed

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7844043

subject: code review 7844043: go.blog: add Atom feed
